name: Sounds of Space
description:
You find yourself at the end of a galaxy's life. Paint your world with light and sound. Using 3 brushes (guns) to paint the world the way you'd like it to sound and look.

Small lil' prototype I put together for SA Game Jam, where the theme was EXPRESSION.

Best Sound, honourable mention :)

Use the brushes at hand to express yourself and bring light back to the end of a galaxy.
